name: RhythmGame
description:
Piano mode

Play whatever song you want from chart and ogg files:

- Add path to chart file (.chart)
- Add path to main audio file (.ogg)
- Add path to second audio file if the audio parts are split (.ogg)
- Choose a difficulty
- Use "start" button to play

Controls:
esc
pause/resume game
W
hit notes on 1st position
X
hit notes on 2nd position
C
hit notes on 3rd position
V
hit notes on 4th position
B
hit notes on 5th position
